text.professional-high-low: I'm establishing a direct connection with our senior engineer on call right now. They'll provide you with a detailed assessment and timeline within 5 minutes.
text.professional-high-high: I'm establishing a direct connection with our senior engineer on call right now. They'll provide you with a detailed assessment from multiple diagnostic perspectives and timeline within 5 minutes.

conversationTree.content: Excellent. That's exactly the level of detail and responsiveness I needed. I'll monitor from my end and wait for your updates. Thank you for the clear communication.
Good. That timeline works. I'll be monitoring from my end. Thanks for the information.
Understood. I'll wait for the resolution. Keep me updated.
